column1: '''''Minas Tirith Evening-Star'' (Volume 12, Number 2)''' is an issue of the journal ''[[Minas Tirith Evening-Star]]'', published by the [[American Tolkien Society]].
Contents include reviews, poetry, and "Tengwaquenta" by Philip Helms.<ref>{{webcite
